biotools.summary: Application that designs allele-specific (AS) primers for detecting SNPs and mutations. WASP input can be either key searches (Section A) or SNPs with flanking sequences (Section B).

bioschemas.name: WASP
bioschemas.summary: Application that designs allele-specific (AS) primers for detecting SNPs and mutations. WASP input can be either key searches (Section A) or SNPs with flanking sequences (Section B).
